name: CallMeKevin Simulator 2022 Re-upload
description:
The most accurate CallMeKevin (3,02 million subscriber count youtuber) simulator in the market. In this game you play as CallMeKevin (3,02 million subscriber count youtuber) and do things that he does every day.

The game is free, but if you enjoyed the game consider donating, because I spent 3 months and over 400 hours making this masterpiece.

Re-upload, because the first one was tagged NSFW for some reason.
